1120570.name: Worldbuilding Pack for Campfire Pro
1120570.description:
Campfire Pro has everything you need to tell a story, offering dedicated features for developing characters, relationships, plot, character arcs, and world. The Worldbuilding Pack takes it even further with brand new features, doubling the number of views in Campfire Pro. It's a DLC aimed at Sci-Fi & Fantasy writers in particular who love adding a high level of detail to their worlds.

With the Worldbuilding Pack, you can access the following new views in Campfire Pro:

  • Species - Describe the species of your world
  • Cultures - Develop the cultures that inhabit your world
  • Languages - Build the phonetics, dictionary, grammar and pragmatics of fictional languages
  • Magic - Design the rules, spells, and history of magic systems
  • Religions - Outline the various religious groups in your world
  • Philosophies - Ponder the complex philosophical movements in your world
  • Systems - Visualize governments, economies, and other organized systems of your societies
  • Items - Record the stats, attributes and histories of your world's items and artifacts

To the Sci-Fi & Fantasy novelists, tabletop RPG players, and hardcore worldbuilders, this Worldbuilding Pack was made for you.
